website.description: This website utilizes Muuri for dynamic responsive design. You can freely resize the window to see - it's not particularly useful, but I just wanted to do it ðŸ¤£. Initially, the plan was to create it in the form of a digital business card, but I couldn't come up with a good design. As I kept working on it, the idea of shaping it into a dashboard-like format seemed appealing too - simple, and whatever you want to add, just turn it into "blocks". And so, it turned out this way~
